title: Novel-style text-based game
original_prompt: I want you to write a [science fiction] style novel, the protagonist is me, and the plot is driven by your description and my choices. I'll enter my action behavior and you'll reply with a description of what the character sees and other information. I hope you only reply the game output in English and nothing else. Don't write explanations. Do not type commands unless I instruct you to do so. When I need supplementary settings, I put the text in brackets (like this). When you encounter a key event that can determine the direction of the plot, you can randomly determine the direction of the event. For example, you pre-assume 3 possible plot directions, and then randomly select one. The background is [a different world continent, where there are different countries, regions and races, including magicians, swordsmen, priests and other combat professions. There are three human countries in this world, one orc country, and creatures such as elves and dragons. There are also demons.] Please imagine the complete terrain, forces and key characters. The following information needs to include gender, age or approximate age for the first time or when appropriate. I am [16 years old, cute and popular with girls]. Tell me the gender and age of the other characters. Please make reasonable settings for each country's politics, economy, military, culture, etc., as well as terrain and legends. Please add the characters and events that appear in the plot, please add my interpersonal relationship, complete background and identity, and give me a systematic introduction. Please add some accidents and more character interactions in the development of the plot to increase the participation of the characters, instead of me alone deciding the direction of the entire plot. Please pay attention to the rationality, logic, and complet
input1: In the continent of Eldoria, where magic intertwines with the mundane, you find yourself in the bustling city of Valenwood, the capital of the Kingdom of Aeloria. At 16 years old, you are a charming young man with tousled brown hair and bright green eyes, known for your quick wit and friendly demeanor. The city is alive with the sounds of merchants hawking their wares, and the air is thick with the scent of exotic spices. As you navigate through the crowded marketplace, you overhear whispers of a brewing conflict between Aeloria and the neighboring Orcish Kingdom of Grathok, known for its fierce warriors and shamanistic traditions. Suddenly, a commotion erupts as a group of elves, led by a strikingly beautiful elven woman named Lyra, confronts a band of orc raiders. You must decide whether to intervene in the conflict, seek help from the local guards, or try to negotiate peace between the two factions.
input2: You awaken in the mystical land of Drakoria, a realm where dragons soar through the skies and ancient magic flows through the rivers. At 16 years old, you are a spirited girl with long, flowing black hair and piercing blue eyes, admired for your bravery and intelligence. The Kingdom of Drakoria is on the brink of war with the neighboring Demon Realm, ruled by the cunning demon lord Malakar, who seeks to conquer the land and enslave its inhabitants. As you explore the enchanted forest near your village, you stumble upon a hidden glade where a wounded dragon lies, its scales shimmering in the dappled sunlight. The dragon, named Zephyr, pleads for your help to recover its strength and warns you of an impending attack from Malakar's forces. You must choose whether to assist the dragon, gather allies from your village, or venture into the heart of the Demon Realm to confront Malakar directly.

As you stand at the edge of the marketplace, the tension in the air is palpable. The elves, with their graceful movements and ethereal beauty, are clearly agitated, their bows drawn and arrows nocked, while the orc raiders, hulking figures with green skin and crude weapons, snarl defiantly. Lyra, the elven leader, has long silver hair cascading down her back and piercing blue eyes that seem to glow with determination.

You can see the crowd around you, a mix of curious onlookers and frightened citizens, all watching the confrontation unfold. The local guards, clad in shining armor, are slow to respond, seemingly unsure of how to handle the escalating situation.

You take a deep breath, weighing your options. The fate of the conflict hangs in the balance, and your decision could change the course of events in Valenwood.

What will you do?

3. Try to negotiate peace between the two factions.
